definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: If we want to carry out Common high Schools human-based management, first we should research the related problem.
sentences.chinese: 普通中學要實施人本管理，需要對相關問題進行研究。

sentences.english: According to the general secondary school students to master the basic level of knowledge and experimental capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 根據普通中學學生的基礎知識掌握水平和實驗能力等。

sentences.english: To cope with this course teaching, ordinary schools have internship workshop.
sentences.chinese: 爲配合這門課程教學，普通中學都設有實習車間。
